### Task

* Note: Don't change any thing form code without question marks.


### Provided Code 

```cpp
// Do Not Edit Here
short a = 1000;
int b = 10000;
long double c = 5.560000505012;

// Change ??? To Something Else To Get The Output
cout << ??? - ??? << "\n"; // 12
cout << ??? + ??? << "\n"; // 20
cout << ??? * ??? << "\n"; // 32
cout << ??? * ??? << "\n"; // 5000
cout << char(??? * ???) << "\n"; // P
